amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 103 that prohibits OSHA from promulgating standards on ergonomic protection.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 103 that prohibits any funding to promulgate, issue, implement, administer, or enforce any proposed, temporary, or final standard on ergonomic protection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 220 (Roll no. 250).
